data-post-time="1504690302901" data-last-modified-time="1504690302901"><time class="section-theme">10:31</time><h3> <a href="http://www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/news/liverpool-news/live-breaking-news-weather-travel-13574559">Teenager arrested over brutal murder of Yusuf Sonko</a></h3><div class="entry-content"><p>Police investigating the brutal murder of 18-year-old <a href="http://www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/news/liverpool-news/yusuf-sonko-murder-police-release-13223971" class="">Yusuf Sonko</a> have arrested a teenager in connection with his death.</p><figure class="in-article-image live-event-image"><div class="outer"><div class="mod-image" data-mod="image"><img src="http://www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/incoming/article13285934.ece/ALTERNATES/s338b/JS123534807.jpg" alt="Yusuf Sonko" content="http://www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/incoming/article13285934.ece/ALTERNATES/s338b/JS123534807.jpg"></div></div><figcaption><span class="caption">Yusuf Sonko</span><span class="credit"> (Image: Family handout/PA Wire)</span></figcaption></figure><blockquote class="live-event-quote section-theme-indicator"><p>Mr Sonko, an A-level student was shot in Tagus Street, off Lodge Lane, on June 2.</p><p>Five bullets were fired at the group of people he was standing with. Four missed but one hit the talented student, who was hoping to study business at university.</p></blockquote></div></div><div class="live-event-entry" id="847992" data-post-time="1504688960256" data-last-modified-time="1504688960256"><time class="section-theme">10:09</time><h3> <a href="http://www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/news/liverpool-news/live-breaking-news-weather-travel-13574559">Coleen mocks 'so-called friends'</a></h3><div class="entry-content"><p>Coleen Rooney has mocked media stories spread by her &#x201C;so-called friends&#x201D;.</p><blockquote class="live-event-quote section-theme-indicator"><p>The 31-year-old poured cold water on <a href="http://www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/news/showbiz-news/scousers-throw-support-behind-coleen-13570918" class="">rumours about her relationship</a> with husband Wayne, spread by anonymous sources reported to be close to her.</p><p>She tweeted: &#x201C;Would love to meet all these so-called friends of mine who know me so well.&#x201D;</p></blockquote><figure class="in-article-image live-event-image"><div class="outer"><div class="mod-image" data-mod="image"><img src="http://www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/incoming/article13578947.ece/ALTERNATES/s338b/JS128178877.jpg" alt="" content="http://www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/incoming/article13578947.ece/ALTERNATES/s338b/JS128178877.jpg"></div></div></figure></div></div><div class="live-event-entry" id="847978" data-post-time="1504688390559" data-last-modified-time="1504688390559"><time class="section-theme">09:59</time><h3> <a href="http://www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/news/liverpool-news/live-breaking-news-weather-travel-13574559">Hillsborough accused make first Crown Court appearance</a></h3><div class="entry-content"><p>Updates from Preston <a href="http://www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/news/liverpool-news/hillsborough-accused-make-first-crown-13578887" class="">HERE</a>. Five suspects are set to appear in crown court this morning faced with allegations linked to the Hillsborough tragedy and its aftermath.</p><figure class="in-article-image live-event-image"><div class="outer"><div class="mod-image" data-mod="image"><img src="http://www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/incoming/article13578904.ece/ALTERNATES/s338b/JS129771080.jpg" alt="Former West Yorkshire and Merseyside chief constable Sir Norman Bettison, who is facing charges following an investigation into the Hillsborough disaster and its aftermath" content="http://www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/incoming/article13578904.ece/ALTERNATES/s338b/JS129771080.jpg"></div></div><figcaption><span class="caption">Former West Yorkshire and Merseyside chief constable Sir Norman Bettison, who is facing charges following an investigation into the Hillsborough disaster and its aftermath</span></figcaption></figure><blockquote class="live-event-quote section-theme-indicator"><p>Key details that may be discussed include the location of any future trials and the dates on which they will begin.</p><p>The court is also expected to hear an update on the position regarding the prosecution of David Duckenfield, the match commander at the tragic 1989 FA Cup semi-final which led to the deaths of 96 Liverpool FC fans.</p></blockquote></div></div><div class="live-event-entry" id="847969" data-post-time="1504687692198" data-last-modified-time="1504687692198"><time class="section-theme">09:48</time><h3> <a href="http://www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/news/liverpool-news/live-breaking-news-weather-travel-13574559">Runcorn Bridge congestion</a></h3><div class="entry-content"><p>Oh dear.
